keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Wells constituency has important industries like dairy farming and tourism. It is also an energy centre of national importance. The proposed site for a Severn Tidal Barrage, which will be decided by the next government, may be the Bristol Channel. This investment is a replacement nuclear power station. It is important that decisions give form to regional plans that best serve the ambitions and concerns of local people.

issues.economy: Employment growth with incomes increasing above inflation comes from supporting Conservative economic policy.
issues.education: Education is the key to the future. Conservative policy provides for more school places, better discipline, higher standards and more apprentices.
issues.environment: David Heathcoat-Amory is campaigning to make sure they listen to local views.

quotes.text: The Business Secretary and key architect of Labour election strategy told the Western Morning News that the Lib-Dems 'have come to the conclusion that with any other party that would put more Tory or Labour MPs in, that is what they are going to do.'
quotes.source: Lord Peter Mandelson in the Western Morning News, 11th March 2010
